title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 340.2 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 340.2 - Definitions

State Regulations

As used in this section: (a) Business days means each regular business
day of the State of New York, excluding weekends and legal holidays. (b) Department records means all records
produced, filed or first kept or promulgated after September 1, 1974. (c) Subject-matter list means a reasonably
detailed current list, by subject matter, of all department records whether or
not available under the Freedom of Information Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
340.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
